posts.text:
In 2022, Erin Jackson became the first Black woman from any country to win gold in any individual event at the Winter Olympics.

Yesterday, she became the first Black woman to bear the flag for #TeamUSA at the Winter Olympics.

Congratulations Erin - keep making us proud!

#BlackHistoryMonth

posts.text:
Last month, 108,435 Americans were laid off. These aren't just numbers, they're people. They're families struggling to make ends meet.

Costs are already high, and this administration's terrible economic leadership is making it worse.
